title: Business Cost Item Settings
description: Configure and edit business cost items

save.title: Confirmation
save.newItems: Save {{count}} new items. Are you sure?
save.updatedItems: Save {{count}} updated items. Are you sure?
save.bothItems: Save {{newCount}} new items and {{updateCount}} updated items. Are you sure?

delete.title: Confirmation
delete.message: Delete this item. Are you sure?

activate.title: Confirmation
activate.message: Activate this item. Are you sure?

messages.excelImportingExportingGuidance: To export the data to Excel or import from Excel please select the location.
messages.excelDataParsingFailed: The malfunction has occurred during the reading of Excel file.
messages.importedFromExcelDataSubmittingError: The malfunction has occurred during uploading of data import from the Excel file.
messages.spreadsheetFileGeneratingError: Failed to export the spreadsheet file
messages.duplicateError: A combination of the same buCostCodeId and currency already exists

validation.intro: The following violations has been detected in exported Excel file:
validation.BUSINESS_COST_ITEM_ID-NOT_EXISTS: The business cost item ID is required while not specified.
validation.BUSINESS_COST_ITEM_ID-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_STR: The business cost item ID has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a string.
validation.BUSINESS_COST_ITEM_ID-STRING_BUT_EMPTY: The business cost item ID has been specified with string, but this string is empty.
validation.BUSINESS_COST_ITEM_ID-HAS_DUPLICATE: It the subsequent occurrence is this file of item with same ID.
validation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-NOT_EXISTS: The business cost item starting year/month is required while not specified.
validation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_STRIN: The business cost item starting year/month has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a string.
validation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-DISALLOWED_CHARACTER: Specified starting year/month including the non-digits characters, while must be the digits sequence like "202509" representing the 4-digits year and 2-digits month.
validation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-WRONG_DIGITS_AT_SPEC: Although specified starting year/month consists from digits, this digits sequence does not represent the valid year and month combination.
validation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-NOT_EXISTS: The business cost item ending year/month is required while not specified.
validation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_STRING: The business cost item ending year/month has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a string
validation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-DISALLOWED_CHARACTERS: Specified ending year/month including the non-digits characters, while must be the digits sequence like "202509" representing the 4-digits year and 2-digits month.
validation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-WRONG_DIGITS_AT_SPECIF: Although specified ending year/month consists from digits, this digits sequence does not represent the valid year and month combination.
validation.CURRENCY_ID-NOT_EXISTS: Currency code is required while not specified.
validation.CURRENCY_ID-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_STRING: Currency code has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a string.
validation.CURRENCY_ID-DISALLOWED_VARIANT: Specified currency code is not allowed. Please specify one of the following currency codes: {{ commaSeparatedAllowedVariants }}.
validation.AMOUNT_VALID_FLAG-NOT_EXISTS: Amount validity flag　is required while not specified.
validation.AMOUNT_VALID_FLAG-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_BOOLEAN: Amount validity flag has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a boolean.
validation.RATE_VALID_FLAG-NOT_EXISTS: Rate validity flag　is required while not specified.
validation.RATE_VALID_FLAG-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_BOOLEAN: Rate validity flag has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a boolean.
validation.CALC_VALID_FLAG-NOT_EXISTS: Calculation validity flag　is required while not specified.
validation.CALC_VALID_FLAG-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_BOOLEAN: Calculation validity flag has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a boolean.
validation.AUTO_CREATE_VALID_FLAG-NOT_EXISTS: Auto creating validity flag　is required while not specified.
validation.AUTO_CREATE_VALID_FLAG-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_BO: Auto creating validity flag has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a boolean.
